note_tweet.text:
The USSR is exhibit B. Within a few years after 1967, when Moscow first made antizionism its domestic & foreign policy priority, some 250k Soviet Jews emigrated, mostly to Israel. 25 years later 1.5 million were gone. (The only reason it took that long is that the USSR shut down Jewish emigration for nearly a decade in the middle.)

The Soviet case also shows how effortlessly left-wing antizionism merges with extremist far-right, neo-Nazi type Jew-hatred. During perestroika, as the state began to fall apart, all kinds of neo-fascist groups started to emerge, which until then had been suppressed. Among their leaders were the ideologues of late-Soviet antizionism‚Äîpeople who gave us the pearls about Zionism being racism, settler-colonialism, imperialism, etc. They preached the tropes of the Protocols of the Elders of Zion & the antizionism of the left in the same breath. 

Their audiences were ordinary Soviet citizens yearning to understand why their world was falling apart. Nobody among them knew or cared that antizionism & antisemitism are not supposed to be the same. Theoretical distinctions between Jews and Zionists didn‚Äôt matter to them one bit. They were just glad to learn that there was, in fact, a big & dangerous enemy out there that controlled & undermined everything. Everything finally made sense.

Soviet Jews like myself who lived through that time remember the very real fears of antisemitic violence & pogroms permeating it. Those were a critical factor in our decision to emigrate. 

We are seeing a similar phenomenon right now in the US & elsewhere in the West. The far-right is happy to jump on the progressive-Islamist antizionist bandwagon. The ideologues of these movements know that distinctions between different forms of Jew-hatred matter only in theory. The bigger the crisis, the quicker the distinctions disappear in practice, and the quicker all the fingers begin to point to Jews, whether they are Zionist, non-Zionist, anti-Zionist or post-Zionist. The only thing that matters in real life is that Jews are to blame. Which is precisely Einat‚Äôs point.
